metadata.title: CVE-2020-9369 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Sympa 6.2.38 through 6.2.52 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (disk consumption from temporary files, and a flood ofnotifications to listmasters) via a series of requests with malformedparameters.

criterions.comment: sympa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
